name: py-psij-python

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PSI/J is an abstraction layer over cluster schedulers to write scheduler
agnostic HPC applications.

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pystache
dependencies.description:
Pystache is a Python implementation of Mustache. Mustache is a
framework-agnostic, logic-free templating system inspired by ctemplate
and et.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: exaworks
dependent_to.description: Virtual package for the Exaworks SDK packages.
